::Darkfate/Blacknighmare::

"Great that you want speak with me, commander kitkat..." spoke 
Darkfate trought the bat-probe while its eyes bliked"But two days 
it's a lot time and several things could happen in two days; well I'm 
reasonable and I can understand that you have your troubles like me; 
one my main troubles is a sort she-bat that had run away... and I 
think that is in Alliance's Base... Blacknightmare could speak about 
her for me if you rather... regarding that that affects you like 
me "and he added "if you had a chance to speak with me before two 
days, you could tell it at blacknighmare... her commands now are stay 
with you. Every need that you have, until our meeting, feel free to 
ask her help"

"Yes my master, I'll do" answered Blacknighmare

"You see.." say Darkfate "Darkfate... Out"

The bat's eyes ended blinked

"Now madam... What can I help you?" said Blacknightmare







--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> She smiled. " I will welcome all the help I can get. Tell your 
master 
> to meet me here in two days. Then I shall meet him and we shall 
talk 
> further. I prefer to talk to the leader, not the messanger. But it 
> was a pleasure meeting you Blacknightmare." she stood up. "Will you 
> need anything else? A room perhaps, to say untill your master 
> arrives?" 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > ::Blacknighmare::
> > 
> > "If inside your agenda's plans is destroy the alliance... he's 
> ready 
> > to help " said Blacknighmare
> >
